overview: In Russia ladybugs are sitting on the lower third of the flag, since they are hiding there like spies in the cables of a computer. Bugs in the machine. On. Off. The mysterious bug ate the Russian Coccinellidae after they had a sexual intercourse for about 5 hours. A woman caged in her apartment. In the news they are saying no is allowed to leave the building. Ban of going out. Someone is inside. Someone is watching her.
title: Flesh In The Machine
